00038 class Diffusion : public KMCCalculator
00039 {
00040 public:
00041     Diffusion() {zero_border=0.0;};
00042    ~Diffusion() {};
00043 
00044     void Initialize(const char *filename, Property *options );
00045     bool EvaluateFrame();
00046     double zero_border;
00047 protected:
00048             void LoadGraph();
00049             void RunKMC(void);
00050             void WriteOcc(void);
00051 
00052             map<int , node_t *> _nodes_lookup;
00053             vector<node_t *> _nodes;
00054             map<int , node_t *> _injection_lookup;
00055             vector<node_t *> _injection;
00056             string _injection_name;
00057             double _runtime;
00058             double _dt;
00059             int _seed;
00060             string _filename; // HACK
00061             matrix diffusion; //matrix for diffusion tensor
00062             int    number_of_points; // number of vectors in diffusion tensor calculation
00063             matrix::eigensystem_t diff_tensor_eigensystem;
00064             
00065 };
00066 
00067 void Diffusion::Initialize(const char *filename, Property *options )
00068 {
00069         if (options->exists("options.diffusion.runtime")) {
00070             _runtime = options->get("options.diffusion.runtime").as<double>();
00071         }
00072         else {
00073             std::runtime_error("Error in diffusion: total run time is not provided");
00074         }
00075 
00076         if (options->exists("options.diffusion.outputtime")) {
00077             _dt = options->get("options.diffusion.outputtime").as<double>();
00078         }
00079         else {
00080             std::runtime_error("Error in diffusion: output frequency is not provided");
00081         }
00082 
00083         if (options->exists("options.diffusion.seed")) {
00084             _seed = options->get("options.diffusion.seed").as<int>();
00085         }
00086         else {
00087             std::runtime_error("Error in diffusion: seed is not provided");
00088         }
00089         
00090         if (options->exists("options.diffusion.injection")) {
00091             _injection_name = options->get("options.diffusion.injection").as<string>();
00092         }
00093         else {
00094             std::runtime_error("Error in diffusion: injection pattern is not provided");
00095         }
00096 
00097         if(options->exists("options.rates.field"))
00098         {
00099             
00100             bool  field_is_zero;
00101             field_is_zero = true;
00102 
00103             if( options->get("options.rates.field").as<vec>().x()>= zero_border )
00104                 {
00105                 field_is_zero = false;
00106                 }
00107             if( options->get("options.rates.field").as<vec>().y()>= zero_border )
00108                 {
00109                 field_is_zero = false;
00110                 }
00111             if( options->get("options.rates.field").as<vec>().z()>= zero_border )
00112                 {
00113                 field_is_zero = false;
00114                 }
00115 
00116             if(!field_is_zero)
00117                 {
00118                 cout<<"WARNING: Electric field is not zero!"<<endl;
00119                 }
00120         }else
00121         {
00122                cout<<"WARNING: Can't find electric field in the option file"<<endl;
00123                cout<<"check whether it is zero"<<endl;
00124         }
00125 
00126         
00127         _filename = filename;
00128 }
00129 
00130 bool Diffusion::EvaluateFrame()
00131 {
00132     srand(_seed);
00133     Random::init(rand(), rand(), rand(), rand());
00134     LoadGraph();
00135     RunKMC();
00136     return true;
00137 }
00138 
00139 void Diffusion::LoadGraph() {
00140 
00141     Database db;
00142     db.Open( _filename );
00143     cout << " Loading graph from " << _filename << endl;
00144     Statement *stmt = db.Prepare("SELECT _id,name FROM conjsegs;");
00145 
00146     while (stmt->Step() != SQLITE_DONE) {
00147         int id = stmt->Column<int>(0);
00148         string name = stmt->Column<string>(1);
00149         node_t *n =new node_t(id);
00150         _nodes.push_back(n);
00151         _nodes_lookup[id] = _nodes.back();
00152         if (wildcmp(_injection_name.c_str(), name.c_str())) {
00153             _injection.push_back(n);
00154             _injection_lookup[id] = _injection.back();
00155         }
00156     }
00157     //delete stmt;
00158     cout << "  -Nodes: " << _nodes.size() << endl;
00159     cout << "  -Injection Points: " << _injection.size() << endl;
00160 
00161     delete stmt;
00162 
00163 
00164     int links = 0;
00165     stmt = db.Prepare("SELECT conjseg1, conjseg2, rate12, rate21, r_x, r_y, r_z FROM pairs;");
00166     while (stmt->Step() != SQLITE_DONE) {
00167         node_t *n1 = _nodes_lookup[stmt->Column<int>(0)];
00168         node_t *n2 = _nodes_lookup[stmt->Column<int>(1)];
00169         double rate12 = stmt->Column<double>(2);
00170         double rate21 = stmt->Column<double>(3);
00171         vec r = vec(stmt->Column<double>(4), stmt->Column<double>(5), stmt->Column<double>(6));
00172         n1->AddEvent(new link_t(n2, rate12, r));
00173         n2->AddEvent(new link_t(n1, rate21, -r));
00174         links += 2;
00175     }
00176     delete stmt;
00177     cout << "  -Links: " << links << endl;
00178 }
00179 
00180 void Diffusion::RunKMC(void)
00181 {
00182         double t = 0;
00183         number_of_points = 0;
00184         //put zeros in diffusion tensor matrix
00185         diffusion.ZeroMatrix();
00186 
00187         srand(_seed);
00188         Random::init(rand(), rand(), rand(), rand());
00189 
00190 
00191         current=_injection[Random::rand_uniform_int(_injection.size())];
00192         cout <<" Starting simulation at node: "<<current->_id-1<<endl;
00193         double next_output = _dt;
00194     int i=0;
00195     while(t<_runtime) {
00196         t+=current->WaitingTime();
00197                 current->onExecute();
00198         if(t > next_output) {
00199                 next_output = t + _dt;
00200                 number_of_points++;
00201 
00202                 
00203                 // calculation of diffusion tensor
00204                 diffusion += r|r;
00205 
00206                 cout << t << ": " << r << endl;
00207         }
00208     }
00209     _runtime = t;
00210     WriteOcc();
00211     cout << std::scientific << "\nKMC run finished\nAverage velocity (m/s): " << r/t*1e-9 << endl;
00212     
00213     // calculating diffusion and printing matrix
00214     diffusion /= number_of_points*2*t;
00215     diffusion *= 1e-18;
00216     cout<<endl<<"Diffusion tensor:"<<endl<<diffusion<<endl;
00217 
00218 
00219     //solve eigensystem
00220     diffusion.SolveEigensystem(diff_tensor_eigensystem);
00221     //cout<<diff_tensor_eigensystem<<endl;
00222 
00223 
00224     cout<<endl<<"Eigenvalues: "<<endl<<endl;
00225     for(int i=0; i<=2; i++)
00226     {
00227         cout<<"Eigenvalue: "<<diff_tensor_eigensystem.eigenvalues[i]<<endl<<"Eigenvector: ";
00228                
00229         cout<<diff_tensor_eigensystem.eigenvecs[i].x()<<"   ";
00230         cout<<diff_tensor_eigensystem.eigenvecs[i].y()<<"   ";
00231         cout<<diff_tensor_eigensystem.eigenvecs[i].z()<<endl<<endl;
00232     }
00233     cout<<endl<<endl<<endl;
00234 
00235 
00236 
00237 
00238 }
00239 
00240 void Diffusion::WriteOcc()
00241 {
00242     Database db;
00243     cout << "Opening for writing " << _filename << endl;
00244         db.Open(_filename);
00245         db.Exec("BEGIN;");
00246         Statement *stmt = db.Prepare("UPDATE conjsegs SET occ = ? WHERE _id = ?;");
00247         for(int i=0; i<_nodes.size(); ++i) {
00248                 stmt->Reset();
00249                 stmt->Bind(1, _nodes[i]->_occ/_runtime);
00250                 stmt->Bind(2, _nodes[i]->_id);
00251                 stmt->Step();
00252         }
00253         db.Exec("END;");
00254         delete stmt;
00255 }

00257 #endif  /* __VOTCA_DIFFUSION_H */
